songs.lyrics:
[Chorus: Akrobatik and Dutch ReBelle)

This love is built to last
I wanna tell the world about it
Baby put it on blast
We let it marinate when we coulda gone fast
But this love is built to last
See. We keep it goin’
On and on and on and on and on and (let’s keep it goin’) (x3)
On and on and on

[Verse 1: Akrobatik]

I heard ‘em say ‘money over bitches
If you know the difference between what a queen and a bitch is, you’ll always have riches
And you and I are now a unit to get this
So anything that’s not on your wish list is dismissed
I wanna get you wide open like a deep threat
Make it last forever like Keith Sweat
We both agree there’s opportunities that we’ll each get
But let’s agree that jealousy’s a place we’ll never reach – bet? (please, yes)
Please just continue to bless me with your presence
Impress me with your essence, and flex your effervescence
‘Cuz you sparkle like bubbly – so damn lovely
How much more lucky could a brother be than this discovery
Other duos ain’t half as strong, won’t last half as long
Maybe it’s because their math is wrong
We’re solid as a rock, like Ashford and Simpson
You found a brother’s heart’s password, and you went in

[Chorus: Akrobatik and Dutch ReBelle]

This love is built to last
I wanna tell the world about it
Baby put it on blast
We let it marinate when we coulda gone fast
But this love is built to last
See. We keep it goin’
On and on and on and on and on and (let’s keep it goin’) (x3)
On and on and on

[Verse 2: Dutch ReBelle]

Like the last two bars in my verse – that’s where you’re crucial
I’m positive that negative’s blurred, you keep me neutral
So all my ladies give you respect, my dude’s salute you
‘Cuz pictures can get fuzzy when the funny wanna shoot you
But when you’re in my flash, you’re quick to crack a smile
Feel like we're runnin' laps, still go the extra mile
Living like a joyride when I crashed into you
Leaving parties, wrapping food up in some plastic for you
My past filled with you, I’m staying on this pathway with you
Just so I can spend my last day with you
They don’t know about the half I would do, staying true
If we ever get in trouble much, skipping through – no double dutch
We talk, sharing lessons with no chalk
Not mad, Boo, that’s just the way I talk
Too hard not to keep you in my thoughts
Style chic from your kiss down to your locks – on the clock for ya

[Chorus]

This love is built to last
I wanna tell the world about it
Baby put it on blast
We let it marinate when we coulda gone fast
But this love is built to last
See, we keep it goin’
On and on and on and on and on and (let’s keep it goin’) (x3)
On and on and on

We keep it goin’
Uh, uh on…
What up
songs.title: Let’s Keep It Goin’
